title: Lucy - complexity of the narrator's new situation

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Kincaid uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complexity of the narrator’s new situation. In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents a defensible interpretation. Select and use evidence to support your line of reasoning. Explain how the evidence supports your line of reasoning. Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Kincaid uses literary elements and techniques to portray the complexity of the narrator’s new situation. Explain how the evidence supports your line of reasoning. Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
